title: Topic 001 Question 036
body: A Security Administrator is configuring an Amazon S3 bucket and must meet the following security requirements:
✑ Logging of all object retrievals in AWS CloudTrail
Which of the following meet these security requirements? (Choose three.)
options: Specify ג€aws:SecureTransportג€: ג€trueג€ within a condition in the S3 bucket policy.
